PerlMonks Syndication

  • Note: If you just want to add PerlMonks' RSS feeds to your reader/aggregator, the following are currently available:
    1. Newest Nodes RSS feed

The purpose of this node is to document the RSS and Atom extension elements used by the PerlMonks RSS/Atom feed generators. It is possible to add or remove such elements in the RSS/Atom feeds without updating this document. So if you become aware of any ways in which this document is out of date, please inform [SiteDocClan].
